reviewText: Mostly made of footage you can find on YouTube.  Concert footage from TOTP, DKRC, and promo videos.  Some interesting stuff, but would be better priced at $30-40 USD.
I'm a fan of bad company.  I enjoyed the DVD so much that I watched it twice.  You must go out and buy this DVD package.  For all of the bad company paul rodgers fans, go out and pick up this DVD.

If you love Bad Company, you HAVE to have this great collection. great insight into the band,and each member.  and if you ever saw them live, back into the 70's, when this great band produced classic after classic tunes, the pure joy of the stories, pictures, and of course, the music, will bring tears of joy to your soul. do yourself a favor, Bad Company fans, and get this package.
